business.headline: Wall Street indices slip as Trump's EU tariff threat raises concernsAt the opening bell, the S&P 500 dipped 0.9 points, or 0.09%, at the open to 5,594.45​, the Dow Jones Industrial Average dropped 70.9 points, or 0.17%, at the open to 41,280.05 and Nasdaq Composite fell 49.9 points, or 0.28%, to 17,598.565.
Old share certificates in your drawer? Here's how you can encash themThe stock value of old shares can be calculated by multiplying the number of stocks held by the current market price.

Check SBI's latest lending rates for March 2025: MCLR and base rateThe updated MCLR rates will directly influence interest rates on various financial products, including home loans, personal loans, and other credit facilities offered by the bank.

BSE, NSE holiday: Is stock market closed for Holi on March 14, 2025?Since there is some uncertainty over whether Holi 2025 falls on Friday or Saturday, it is important to check the official list of stock market holidays for clarity.

Policies are a nightmare: Nithin Kamath on why life insurance is getting tougherSince the onset of COVID-19, insurance companies have faced an increase in claims, which has led them to reassess their underwriting policies and tighten their approval process.

Sensex, Nifty erase early gains to end lower; Auto, IT stocks weigh on marketsThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 200.85 points to end at 73,828.91, while the NSE Nifty50 was down by 73.30 points to close at 22,397.20.

Does it make sense to stop investing in mutual funds amid market correction?Sensex and Nifty are down nearly 15% from their September all-time highs as volatility continues to make its presence felt, and market correction is the flavour being served on Dalal Street.

March 15 advance tax deadline: Are you required to pay?Salaried individuals, freelancers, and businesses must pay advance tax if their total tax liability (after TDS/TCS) exceeds Rs 10,000 in FY 2024-25.

Filing your advance tax? Here's how to calculate itAdvance tax is applicable when the total tax liability for a financial year exceeds Rs 10,000. It is computed based on the estimated income for the year and paid in instalments as per the due dates.

Is your UPI linked to an inactive mobile number? Here's how NPCI protects youBy March 31, 2025, all banks and payment service providers (PSPs) offering UPI services must update their databases to remove inactive or recycled mobile numbers. The move aims to reduce errors and prevent fraud caused by mobile number churn.
Airtel and Jio team up with SpaceX to bring Starlink: What it means for telcosSpaceX is still awaiting permission from the government to officially launch Starlink's services in the country.

Is Form 16 necessary for ITR filing? What to do if you don't have it?Form 16 provides details of the deducted tax amount and submission date and helps in ITR filing by ensuring accurate income and tax details, reducing the chances of errors.

Extra work from home days at Infosys needs manager's nod: ReportThis comes as the Bengaluru-based IT company rolled out a new mandate on Monday, which requires its employees to work from the office at least 10 days a month.

Explained: Why MTNL share price rose 18% todayOver the past year, the stock has gained 18.61%. Year-to-date (YTD), the stock has declined by 15.66%. In the last six months, the stock has dropped 23.25%  and in the last three months, it has fallen 25.95%.

Who is Lip-Bu Tan, industry veteran named Intel CEO?Lip-Bu Tan, who officially takes over on March 18, has extensive experience in the chip sector and is known for investing in promising tech startups.

Explained: Why Sensex, Nifty are giving up early gains almost every dayStock market today: Despite multiple signals pointing to a strong opening, the Sensex and Nifty couldn't hold on to early gains. Right now, they are barely 0.10% higher.
Sensex, Nifty gain momentum on inflation relief, IndusInd Bank falls 2%The S&P BSE Sensex gained 250.89 points to 74,280.65, while the NSE Nifty50 added 59.70 points to 22,530.20 as of 10 AM.

Not freebies, job creation will omit poverty from India: Narayana MurthyInfosys co-founder Narayana Murthy has slammed the freebies of culture, saying that job creation by innovative entrepreneurs will help eliminate poverty from India.

Stocks to watch today: Infosys, BEL, Ola Electric, Tata Motors and moreStocks to watch today (March 13): Infosys, Tata Motors, and Bharat Electronics Limited are likely to be in focus today as domestic markets gear up for a mildly positive start.

Will Sensex, Nifty recover today? 3 things to know ahead of stock market openingStock market opening prediction today: Sensex and Nifty are likely to open higher after positive US and domestic retail inflation data.

Income tax deadline: Only 3 days left to pay last instalment of advance taxMaking timely payments is crucial when it comes to tax compliance to avoid penalties and interest. Also, meeting deadlines ensures last-minute stress and a smooth tax filing process.

Wall Street on edge: Inflation eases, but global retaliation hits stocks hardAfter jumping to a big early gain on an encouraging inflation update, Wall Street gave back much of it after other countries announced their retaliations following President Donald Trump's latest escalation in his trade war.

Wall Street opens higher as softer inflation data boosts investor confidenceAt the opening bell, the S&P 500 rose 52.8 points, or 0.95%, to 5,624.84 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average was up by 144.0 points, or 0.35%, to 41,577.5. The Nasdaq Composite also witnessed a rise of 275.3 points, or 1.58%, to 17,711.41.
Equity mutual fund inflows fall 26% in February amid market volatilityMarket fluctuations impacted mutual fund inflows across categories, with equity and hybrid funds seeing a decline.

Retail inflation eases to 7-month low of 3.61% in FebruaryRetail inflation in February has cooled to a seven-month low, and it has also fallen below the RBI's medium-term target for the first time in six months.
TDS rules from April 1: Higher tax-free limits on FD interest, lotteryTo benefit senior citizens, the government has doubled the TDS threshold for interest income from Rs 50,000 to Rs 1 lakh.

Sensex, Nifty end marginally lower as IT stocks tumble; Infosys falls over 4%The S&P BSE Sensex ended 72.56 points lower at 74,029.76, while the NSE Nifty50 settled 27.40 points lower at 22,470.50. All the other broader market indices also ended in negative territory.

Temasek takes a bit of Haldiram's, buys 10% stake for $1 billion: ReportTemasek, which has already invested in Manipal Hospitals and fast-food giant Devyani International (operator of KFC and Pizza Hut in India), is now looking to cash in on the growing snacks market with its Haldiram's bet.

Air India rolls out premium economy fares starting at Rs 599 for a limited timeThese premium economy fares are above regular economy fares on domestic flights for a limited time. Prices vary based on routes and demand.

India's top 7 billionaires lose $34 billion amid stock market slumpMukesh Ambani, India's richest person, lost $3.13 billion this year, though he still remains India's richest man with a net worth of $87.5 billion.

Sensex falls over 400 points. 3 factors behind today's stock market slumpStock market today: At around 12:42 pm, the S&P BSE Sensex was down 439.77 points to 73,662.55 and the Nifty50 was trading 150.50 points lower at 22,347.40.

Why are some investors choosing fixed deposits over SIPs?Many stock market experts suggest that mid-cap and small-cap stocks are currently expensive, which has triggered a correction in the last six months.

Explained: Why IndusInd Bank share price is rising today after 27% crashIndusIndi Bank stock price: The stock surged nearly 14% from its intraday low, climbing to Rs 690 on the National Stock Exchange (NSE), breaking a five-day losing streak.At around 12 pm, shares of the company were up 3.18% to Rs 676.80 on the NSE.

5 billionaires at Trump's swearing-in see over $200 billion vanish in weeks   The start of Donald Trump's second term has been brutal for some of the world's richest billionaires, including those present at his swearing-in ceremony.

Jio and Airtel sign deals with Elon Musk's Starlink for satellite internet in IndiaJio and Airtel have signed separate agreements with Elon Musk's Starlink to bring satellite internet to India. The partnerships aim to provide high-speed broadband to remote and underserved areas. Starlink's service rollout depends on government approval. The deals could improve connectivity for education, healthcare, and businesses in regions lacking fibre-optic infrastructure. Starlink uses a constellation of 6,900 satellites for global broadband coverage.

Reliance shares gain after Jio's deal with Elon Musk's SpaceX for StarlinkRIL shares were up over 1% in early trade but gave up some gains due to market volatility. Around 10 am, the stock was trading 0.35% higher at Rs 1,251.50.
Infosys, TCS, Wipro: Why are major IT stocks falling today?At around 9:50 am, Infosys shares were down 3.5% and Wipro fell over 3.35%. HCLTech was down over 2.4% and TCS tumbled nearly 2%.

Sensex, Nifty swing between gains and losses in volatile session; IT stocks downThe S&P BSE Sensex, which was up nearly 300 points in early trade, fell 91.43 points to trade at 74,010.37 around 9:30 am. The Nifty50 also fell 40.60 points to trade at 22,457.30.

After Airtel, Jio signs deal with Elon Musk's SpaceX to bring Starlink to IndiaThe partnership aims to expand broadband access across India, especially in remote areas. Jio, which handles more mobile data than any other operator, will use Starlink's satellite network to strengthen its internet services.

Stock market today: Will Trump's latest tariff threat impact Dalal Street today? Stock market opening today: While domestic stocks remain under pressure, experts suggested that Dalal Street is unlikely to feel the impact of the ongoing weakness in US stock markets.

entertainment.headline: Liberal women like Ratna Pathak Shah often question sanskriti: Actor Rajesh KumarActor Ratna Pathak Shah's remarks on Karva Chauth in 2022 sparked a debate, leading to a response from her co-star Rajesh Kumar, who defended traditional customs.

It's do or die for Siddharth as cricketer Arjun in Test promo. WatchCricketer R Ashwin unveiled the character promo of Siddharth as Arjun in Netflix's upcoming project, Test. The film will stream on Netflix from April 4.

Kim, Khloe Kardashian didn't know Ambanis, yet attended the weddingKim Kardashian and Khloe recall their time in India from last year when they flew down to attend the grand wedding of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant. Kim reveals that she didn't know the Ambani family and still decided to participate in the festivities.

Honey Singh on making socially responsible songs: We are artistes, not scholarsSinger and rapper Yo Yo Honey Singh, in an interview with India Today Digital, got candid about crafting socially responsible songs for the youth. The singer added how his attempts to craft such songs failed to resonate with the audience.

Kim Soo-hyun faces backlash amid Kim Sae-ron controversy, loses brand deals: ReportKim Soo-hyun is embroiled in controversy over his alleged past relationship with the late Kim Sae-ron. The actor faces backlash, losing followers and brand deals.

The art of filmmaking with Daredevil Born Again – A technical marvelDaredevil Born Again has captivated audiences with its unique approach to cinematography and storytelling. The show, consisting of seven episodes, is streaming on JioHotstar.

Maui Police chief accused of covering up alleged Diddy, Odell Beckham Jr. assaultMaui Police Chief John Pelletier is accused of covering up an alleged gang rape involving Sean 'Diddy' Combs, Odell Beckham Jr, and Druski. The lawsuit claims Pelletier attempted to conceal the 2018 assault.

More photos from Prajakta Koli-Vrishank Khanal's Haldi out. Seen yet?Prajakta Koli's friend has shared more photos from her and Vrishank Khanal's Haldi ceremony on Instagram. Check out the pictures here.

Panchayat actor Durgesh Kumar 'struggling' despite hit projects in 25-year careerActor Durgesh Kumar, known for his roles in Panchayat and Laapataa Ladies, shared that he still struggles to find significant roles despite his success. He said that he still has to chase casting directors for auditions despite recognition in his 25-year-long career in the industry.

TV actor Aditi Sharma responds to allegations of cheating from estranged husbandAditi Sharma refuted her estranged husband Abhineet Kaushik's allegations of infidelity, asserting that their marital issues stem from his insecurities and not her actions. She also claimed that she faced 'serious problems' in the four months of marriage.

Kim So-hyun's relationship with Kim Sae-ron confirmed by Dispatch. DetailsA news report by Dispatch shed light on the controversy surrounding Kim Soo-hyun and Kim Sae-ron's alleged past relationship and the financial and emotional turmoil Kim Sae-ron faced, which might have led up to her tragic death.
K-pop group NMIXX makes a bold comeback with High HorseK-pop group NMIXX is making a bold comeback with High Horse. And this time, they have a surprise for their desi fans.

Kim, Khloe Kardashian search for their missing diamond at Ambani wedding. WatchIn the latest promo of The Kardashian Season 6, Kardashian sisters, Kim and Khloe, are seen panicking over their missing diamond as they attend the grand Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant wedding in Mumbai.

TV actor Aditi Sharma's rumoured boyfriend breaks silence amid infidelity allegationApollena actor Aditi Sharma's co-star Samarthya Gupta has denied rumours of an affair with her, calling the allegations baseless and harmful. Aditi's husband had alleged infidelity.

Kim Sae-ron's unpublished statement emerges after dating rumours with Kim Soo-hyunAlmost a month after South Korean actor Kim Sae-ron's death, her aunt has alleged K-drama star Kim Soo-hyun was in a relationship with Sae-ron, and that they began dating when she was only a minor.

Did Ekta Kapoor just take a jibe at Ram Kapoor in a video about Ozempic?Filmmaker Ekta Kapoor on Tuesday shared a video on Instagram in which she was seen talking about her weight gain and if she should follow artificial methods to lose some weight. There was also a Ram Kapoor connection.

Ibrahim Ali Khan re-posts Nadaaniyan's poor ratings, puzzled fans reactIbrahim Ali Khan reposted his film, Nadaaniyan's low ratings. Fans were puzzled by the actor's move in highlighting the film's poor performance.

Singer Ne-Yo introduces his four girlfriends from his polyamorous relationship In a candid revelation, American singer and songwriter Ne-Yo introduced his four girlfriends, embracing a polyamorous lifestyle. The musician shared insights into his unique relationship dynamic online, calling it his 'pyramid'.

Tapu-Sonu wedding in Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah…? Fans say 'must be Bhide's dream'A promo of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah shows Tapu marrying Sonu, leaving fans in shock. Many speculate it's a dream sequence, as Bhide disapproves of Tapu. The sitcom, India's longest-running, first aired in 2008.

general news.headline: Taliban reject Pak's claim of Afghanistan link to train hijackThe Taliban denied Pakistan's claim that Afghanistan-based militants were involved in the Balochistan train hijacking. The Baloch Liberation Army claimed responsibility. Pakistani officials said attackers communicated with handlers in Afghanistan, a claim the Taliban rejected.

Tamil Nadu replaces rupee symbol from Budget in big language row escalationTamil Nadu Chief Minister MK Stalin sent a strong message to the central government about his stance against the three-language formula. The official rupee symbol was replaced with the letter for 'ru' from 'rubai' (rupees in Tamil) from the state budget 2025-26 logo.

Lilavati Hospital's founding family torn by controversy, conflict, court affairsThe allegations emerged from an FIR filed by the Lilavati Kirtilal Mehta Medical Trust (LKMMT) against 17 people, including seven former trustees, equipment suppliers and vendors for embezzling over Rs 1,250 crore over the past two decades.

Aamir Khan dating Gauri Spratt, friend of 25 yearsActor Aamir Khan is dating his friend of 25 years, Gauri Spratt. She is the mother of a six-year-old boy and has already met Khan's family members and friends, including Shah Rukh Khan and Salman Khan.

Does three-language formula in NEP actually impose Hindi?Tamil Nadu has alleged that the New Education Policy 2020 is an attempt at imposing Hindi in the Tamil-speaking state. What is the history of India's policy on language in education, and how does NEP 2020 differ? Is it really a bid to impose Hindi? A look at all sides of the debate.

All England 2025: Lakshya Sen knocks out defending champion to reach quartersAll England Open 2025: Unseeded Lakshya Sen came up with a sensational display in men's singles second-round, knocking out defending champion Jonathan Christie in straight games.

A woman can marry 10 men in north: DMK minister's delimitation jab sparks rowThe remarks by DMK's Durai Murugan come at a time when the proposed delimitation exercise has added to the growing animosity between Tamil Nadu and the Centre amid a language war.

Trump's 200% wine tariff threat if EU does not remove tax on US whiskeyUS President Donald Trump threatened a 200% tariff on European Union wines and alcoholic products if the bloc's whiskey tariff is not lifted. The European Commission plans to impose tariffs on US goods next month.

One nation, one script: Time to gut India's language warIndia's linguistic diversity is both its strength and its struggle. Since Independence, language has been a political flashpoint, from Tamil Nadu's anti-Hindi agitations to debates over the National Education Policy. With 22 official scripts complicating communication, is it time to adopt a single script?
Old share certificates in your drawer? Here's how you can encash themThe stock value of old shares can be calculated by multiplying the number of stocks held by the current market price.

John Abraham on jingoism, and how The Diplomat doesn't show 'Pakistanis as evil'Actor-producer John Abraham opens up about his upcoming film, The Diplomat, jingoism in movies and more in an exclusive interaction with India Today.

Fast bowler Mark Wood likely to miss India Test series, out of action for 4 monthsFast bowler Mark Wood is likely to miss the five-Test series against India at home in June-August. Wood underwent surgery after a long-standing knee injury flared up during the Champions Trophy 2025.

A murder in Beed: A wake-up call for Maharashtra and IndiaIn a village in Beed district of Maharashtra, the accused beat up a sarpanch with rods, tortured him, and even urinated on his body before killing him.
Total lunar eclipse: These cities will witness Moon turn blood redThe total lunar eclipse on March 14 will occur during the full moon phase, which coincides with the culmination of Holi celebrations.
Donatella Versace quits as design chief after 3 decades amid sale speculationDonatella Versace is stepping down as Chief Creative Officer of Versace, with Dario Vitale set to replace her on April 1.

Pakistan hiding defeat: Baloch insurgents reject Army's Jaffar Express op claimThe Balochistan Liberation Army (BLA) denied the Pakistani military's claims that the Jaffar Express hostage crisis in the Balochistan province had ended. The group claimed that fighting was ongoing, with Pakistani forces facing significant losses.

When bandits hijacked luxury train in China, took 300 passengers hostageBaloch militants hijacked a train in Pakistan and the hostage crisis ended after a day-long military operation. About 100 years ago, bandits in China hijacked the luxury Peking Express, taking 300 passengers, mostly foreigners, hostage. The incident, in which the hostages were kept captive for 37 days in a mountainous area, stunned the world.

7 Indian eateries make it to Asia's 50 Best Restaurants 2025 extended listThe acclaimed organisation '50 Best' has revealed the results for the 51st to 100th rankings of Asia's best restaurants. The top 50 entries will be disclosed on March 25 in Seoul at an awards ceremony.

Rupee symbol dropped by Tamil Nadu was designed by son of ex-DMK MLARupee symbol row: The rupee symbol was designed by Udaya Kumar Dharmalingam, an IIT professor and the son of a former DMK MLA. This gave the BJP ammo to blast the DMK government.

OpenAI whistleblower's mother shares image from day of his death, alleges murderA new clue has emerged in the mysterious death of Suchir Balaji as his mother shares a crucial CCTV image from the day he died.

This green bottle has Thailand's tourists (even BlackPink's Lisa) totally hookedThe rise of the Hong Thai inhaler (the viral Thailand's green bottle) seems to go hand in hand with the influx of tourists pouring into Thailand and their desire to try something uniquely local.

Ranya Rao's father ordered protocol assistance at airport: Cop's damning claimConstable Basavaraj claimed DGP Ramachandra Rao, Ranya Rao's stepfather, instructed him to provide protocol assistance at Bengaluru Airport. Basavaraj denied involvement in gold smuggling but admitted assisting her multiple times.

Huge stretch of Amazon forest cleared out to build highway for climate summitTens of thousands of acres of Amazon rainforest are being cleared out to build a new four-lane highway in Brazil's Balem, which will host the COP30 climate summit in November.

IT minister's deleted Starlink tweet draws Opposition heat: Approval guaranteed?Ashwini Vaishnaw deleted his tweet welcoming Starlink after Airtel and Jio announced deals to market Elon Musk's Starlink satellite internet in India.

How Bong Joon-ho redefines filmmaking with Mickey 17, once againBong Joon-ho, renowned for his genre-bending narratives and sharp social critiques, continues to captivate audiences with his latest release, Mickey 17. From Parasite's Oscar triumph to his earlier works, discover how Bong's films blend emotion, satire, and thrilling storytelling.

John Abraham on making The Diplomat, his next film Tehran and more. VideoActor-producer John Abraham opened up about making his upcoming release, The Diplomat, during an interaction with India Today. He also spoke about his upcoming project, the political drama, Tehran.

John Abraham on jingoism, and how The Diplomat doesn't show 'Pakistanis as evil'Actor-producer John Abraham opens up about his upcoming film, The Diplomat, jingoism in movies and more in an exclusive interaction with India Today.

sports.headline: NFL: Quaterback Aaron Rodgers released by the JetsQuaterback Aaron Rodgers was released by the Jets. He's now a first-time free agent.

Harry Brook becomes first player banned for withdrawing after auctionStar England batter Harry Brook has been banned for two years from the Indian Premier League (IPL) after withdrawing from the upcoming season of the tournament.

All England 2025: Lakshya Sen knocks out defending champion to reach quartersAll England Open 2025: Unseeded Lakshya Sen came up with a sensational display in men's singles second-round, knocking out defending champion Jonathan Christie in straight games.
Is Luka Doncic Playing tonight? NBA injury updates for Lakers vs BucksLuka Doncic listed as questionable for the Lakers and Bucks due to an ankle injury

West Virginia coach bans players from dancing on TikTokWest Virginia football coach Rich Rodriguez banned players from dancing on TikTok, emphasizing discipline and team image. While allowing the app, he prioritizes football over social media engagement for his athletes.

Mitchell Starc agrees India had clear advantage in Dubai during Champions TrophyAustralia fast bowler Mitchell Starc agrees that India had a clear advantage in Dubai during the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. India played all of their matches at the same venue after refusing to travel to Pakistan.

Play Varun Chakravarthy in England Test series: Navjot Singh SidhuNavjot Singh Sidhu backed Varun Chakravarthy to exploit England's spin weakness in the upcoming Test series, urging India's head coach Gautam Gambhir to make strategic selections despite the IPL season.

AB de Villiers surprised by criticismFormer South Africa captain AB de Villiers lashed out at critics of Rohit Sharma, saying he was not able to understand why there are questions over the India captain's place in the side in one-day internationals. Rohit led India to Champions Trophy triumph.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
